actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: To impose an additional duty on imported goods and to provide that amounts equal to the revenues delivered therefrom be available for the national health care purposes.

summary.text: Imposes an additional duty of four percent ad valorem on imported goods. Establishes within the Treasury the National Health Care Trust Fund consisting of the duties imposed under this Act.

titles.title: To impose an additional duty on imported goods and to provide that amounts equal to the revenues delivered therefrom be available for the national health care purposes.
